content.title: Youth Retreat Spring 2022
content.description: Join us at Muskoka Woods for an epic come back retreat!

image1.alt: Hands in the air and colourful clouds with a logo on top.

content.text1: The time has come! Think back to some of the most meaningful times in your life. Maybe it was a significant conversation you had at camp, on a road trip, or with teammates. Whatever it was, chances are, it involved things like friends, a beautiful setting, and an impactful experience with Jesus.

content.header2: Jr. and Sr. High Youth Retreat
content.text2: Cost: Earlybird until April 18 - $179; Regular after April 18 - $199
content.text3: The cost covers all of your transportation, accommodations, meals, and a couple surprises. Registration closes May 1, 2022.

image1.alt: Graphic for Spring Youth Retreat called Reboot.
Kids and Youth at Muskoka Woods.

list.question: What Will We Do?
answer: We’ve designed the program to be simple in its purpose: to encourage the growth of our relationships with one another and with Jesus. We’ll have times of worship, teaching, devotions, and Small Group discussion, as well as a few activities designed purely for fun and laughter together. We hope that this weekend is the start of many life-transforming conversations.

list.question: Where Are We Staying?
answer: We are staying at the beautiful Muskoka Woods Resort, in Lake Rosseau Ontario, where we’ll be served by their lovely staff. We’ll stay in cabins with bunk beds and have all of our bathroom amenities.

list.question: How Do We Get There?
answer: On an amazing, super fun, magical bus! First things first, we’re taking a bus because it’s really practical. But more than that, the bus brings everybody together right away. What better way to start such a relational trip than that?  Whether you feel like you know people or not, you will know people really well by the time we get there. We’ll pass the time with games, snacks, and conversations. The journey is often one of the best parts of a trip!

list.question: How can I give to subsize the retreat?
answer: Thank you for considering! This has been a tough few years for many financially and your donation helps us ensure that finances don't stand in the way of a student or leader joining the trip.
There are four ways you can give without writing a cheque or giving cash. This year we are not accepting cash or cheque donations this year as a means to limit the spread of COVID-19.

Add-on: Already registering a student? Use the 'add-on donation for subsidy funds' option when you choose a ticket type in the registration form. This will automatically add a $50 donation to your ticket.
Bill Pay: You can donate through your online banking as a bill payment. Just use your personalized giving number plus the code YOU (5 digits + 3 letters) ie. 0####YOU.
InFellowship: You can donate online through your The Meeting House InFellowship account.
If you are unable to give through these platforms please contact Rachel Meredith at rachel.meredith@themeetinghouse.com or call her 905.287.7000 ext. 7026
